segments.text: Yes . By the way , you are having a great make-up today . I like the color of your lipstick . So adorable !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? It took me really a while to find the color . I am happy you like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , girls like us are happy to spend our time on those kinds of things . Actually , do we still have a meeting this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , when those never ending meetings .
segments.speaker: S1
